law.catch_line: Bond Or Insurance Policy – Limit Of Liability.
law.full_text:
BOND OR INSURANCE POLICY – LIMIT OF LIABILITY.
The limit of liability upon any bond or policy of insurance, posted pursuant to the requirements of this article, shall in no case be less than $5,000.00 for bodily injuries to or death of one person. The permissible limit of liability for bodily injuries or death of more than one person shall depend upon the number of bench permits covered thereby and shall not be less than the amount specified in the following schedule:
[ BENCH PERMITS – LIABILITY LIMIT ]
Number of Bench Permits
Limit of Liability
1 to 10
$10,000.00
11 to 50
20,000.00
51 to 100
40,000.00
101 or more
80,000.00

unit.catch_line: Permit Required From Board Of Public Works.
Bond Or Insurance Policy – Limit Of Liability.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
BOND OR INSURANCE POLICY – LIMIT OF LIABILITY. (§ 68.11)
BOND OR INSURANCE POLICY – LIMIT OF LIABILITY. The limit of liability upon any bond or policy of insurance, posted pursuant to the requirements of this article, shall in no case be less than $5,000.00 for bodily injuries to or death of one person. The permissible limit of liability for bodily injuries or death of more than one person shall depend upon the number of bench permits covered thereby and shall not be less than the amount specified in the following schedule:[ BENCH PERMITS – LIABILITY LIMIT ]
Number of Bench Permits
Limit of Liability
1 to 10
$10,000.00
11 to 50
20,000.00
51 to 100
40,000.00
101 or more
80,000.00
